thread.section_title: Hotel 17 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfortable
thread.title_full: Comfortable - Review of Hotel 17, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Olga P
title: Comfortable
text: Good small hotel, but price is very high for this plsce. Shower is in the corridor - not comfortable. Very noisy heater, it makes annoying metallic noise, we couldn't sleep because of it. Not very big bed, small for two. The windows are old, noise comes into the room from iutside. The location is good, not so far from Central Park, Little Italy, Walk Street, Broadway.
